appRoles.displayName: Read and write workforce integrations
appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage workforce integrations to synchronize data from Microsoft Teams Shifts, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write presence information for all users
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all presence information and write activity and availability of all users in the directory without a signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, time zone and location.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write tags in Teams
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write tags in Teams without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read tags in Teams
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read tags in Teams without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all Windows update deployment settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write all Windows update deployment settings for the organization without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write external connections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write external connections without a signed-in user. The app can only read and write external connections that it is authorized to, or it can create new external connections.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write external items
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write external items without a signed-in user. The app can only read external items of the connection that it is authorized to.

appRoles.displayName: Access selected site collections
appRoles.description: Allow the application to access a subset of site collections without a signed in user.  The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.

appRoles.displayName: Read items in all site collections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write items in all site collections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write Cloud PCs
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of Cloud PCs, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read Cloud PCs
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the properties of Cloud PCs, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and update service principal endpoints
appRoles.description: Allows the app to update service principal endpoints

appRoles.displayName: Read service principal endpoints
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read service principal endpoints

appRoles.displayName: Send a teamwork activity to any user
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds without a signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.

appRoles.displayName: Read all terms of use acceptance statuses
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses, without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all terms of use agreements
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements, without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all terms of use agreements
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read terms of use agreements, without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all consent requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read app consent requests and approvals, and deny or approve those requests without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write your organization's consent request policy
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's consent requests policy without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all consent requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read consent requests and approvals without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read basic mail in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read basic mail properties in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Includes all properties except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties.

appRoles.displayName: Read basic mail in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read basic mail properties in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Includes all properties except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write feature rollout policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write feature rollout policies without a signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all directory RBAC settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

appRoles.displayName: Read all directory RBAC settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write organization information
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

appRoles.displayName: Read organization information
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

appRoles.displayName: Read all company places
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all hidden memberships
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write items in external datasets
appRoles.description: Allow the app to read or write items in all external datasets that the app is authorized to access

appRoles.displayName: Manage access reviews for group and app memberships
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization for group and app memberships, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read Microsoft Intune apps
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read Microsoft Intune devices
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read Microsoft Intune RBAC settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read Microsoft Intune configuration
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage on-premises published resources
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, view, update and delete on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, as part of a hybrid identity configuration, without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write trust framework key sets
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write trust framework key set properties without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read trust framework key sets
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read trust framework key set properties without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write your organization's trust framework policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read your organization's policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write identity providers
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read identity providers
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all administrative units
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete administrative units and manage administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all administrative units
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all published labels and label policies for an organization.
appRoles.description: Allows an app to read published sensitivity labels and label policy settings for the entire organization or a specific user, without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all OneNote notebooks
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Invite guest users to the organization
appRoles.description: Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write files in all site collections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any threat indicators it does not own.

appRoles.displayName: Read and update your organization's security actions
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read or update security actions, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read your organization's security actions
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read security actions, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and update your organization’s security events
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events.

appRoles.displayName: Read your organization’s security events
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all chat messages
appRoles.description: Allows an app to read and write all chat messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all risk detection information
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and update identity risk detection information for your organization without a signed-in user. Update operations include confirming risk event detections.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all risky user information
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for your organization without a signed-in user.  Update operations include dismissing risky users.

appRoles.displayName: Read files in all site collections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all identity risk event information
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the identity risk event information for your organization without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read a limited subset of the organization's roster
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read a limited subset of properties from both the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users. Includes name, status, role, email address and photo.

appRoles.displayName: Read the organization's roster
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write the organization's roster
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read and written.

appRoles.displayName: Read class assignments without grades
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read assignments without grades for all users.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write class assignments without grades
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write assignments without grades for all users.

appRoles.displayName: Read class assignments with grades
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades for all users.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write class assignments with grades
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write assignments and their grades for all users.

appRoles.displayName: Read Education app settings
appRoles.description: Read the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.

appRoles.displayName: Manage education app settings
appRoles.description: Manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.

appRoles.displayName: Read all identity risky user information
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the identity risky user information for your organization without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all users' full profiles
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all audit log data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and query your audit log activities, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage apps that this app creates or owns
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create other applications, and fully manage those applications (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any apps that it is not an owner of.

appRoles.displayName: Export user's data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).

appRoles.displayName: Manage all programs
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all programs
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage all access reviews
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all access reviews
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all usage reports
appRoles.description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports without a signed-in user.  Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

appRoles.displayName: Read all users' relevant people lists
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read any user's scored list of relevant people, without a signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).

appRoles.displayName: Flag chat messages for violating policy
appRoles.description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams 1-to-1 or group chat messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

appRoles.displayName: Read all chat messages
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all 1-to-1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams.

appRoles.displayName: Read all channel messages
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all channel messages in Microsoft Teams

appRoles.displayName: Flag channel messages for violating policy
appRoles.description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams channel messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all applications
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all user mailbox settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write domains
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write all domain properties without a signed in user.  Also allows the app to add,  verify and remove domains.

appRoles.displayName: Read all user mailbox settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

appRoles.displayName: Read mail in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write mail in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

appRoles.displayName: Send mail as any user
appRoles.description: Allows the app to send mail as any user without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read contacts in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write contacts in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all groups
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read group properties and memberships, and read the calendar and conversations for all groups, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all groups
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create groups, read all group properties and memberships, update group properties and memberships, and delete groups. Also allows the app to read and write group calendar and conversations.  All of these operations can be performed by the app without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read directory data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write directory data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user.  Does not allow user or group deletion.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write devices
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user.  Does not allow device creation, device deletion or update of device alternative security identifiers.

appRoles.displayName: Read calendars in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write calendars in all mailboxes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all identity user flows
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your organization's user flows, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all identity user flows
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read or write your organization's user flows, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and create online meetings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and create online meetings as an application in your organization.

appRoles.displayName: Read online meeting details
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read online meeting details in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Access media streams in a call as an app
appRoles.description: Allows the app to get direct access to media streams in a call, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Join group calls and meetings as a guest
appRoles.description: Allows the app to anonymously join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.  The app will be joined as a guest to meetings in your organization.

appRoles.displayName: Join group calls and meetings as an app
appRoles.description: Allows the app to join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.  The app will be joined with the privileges of a directory user to meetings in your organization.

appRoles.displayName: Initiate outgoing group calls from the app
appRoles.description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to multiple users and add participants to meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Initiate outgoing 1 to 1 calls from the app
appRoles.description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to a single user and transfer calls to users in your organization’s directory, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read organizational contacts
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts without a signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune apps
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Perform user-impacting remote actions on Microsoft Intune devices
appRoles.description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune devices
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device’s owner

appRoles.displayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune RBAC settings
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune configuration
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage all delegated permission grants
appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage permission grants for delegated permissions exposed by any API (including Microsoft Graph), without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all users' teamwork activity feed
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD roles
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD groups
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read privileged access to Azure resources
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to audit Azure resources in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD roles
appRoles.description: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD groups
appRoles.description: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure resources
appRoles.description: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all threat indicators
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all the indicators for your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all privileged access approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read privileged access requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all entitlement management approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read entitlement management requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all admin consent approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read admin consent requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all customer lockbox approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read customer lockbox requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all privileged access approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write privileged access requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all entitlement management approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write entitlement management requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all admin consent approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write admin consent requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all customer lockbox approval requests
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write customer lockbox requests, business flows, and governance policy templates without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all users' installed Teams apps
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Manage all users' Teams apps
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Deliver and manage all user's notifications
appRoles.description: Allows the app to send, read, update and delete user’s notifications, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all applications
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all BitLocker keys
appRoles.description: Allows an app to read BitLocker keys for all devices, without a signed-in user. Allows read of the recovery key.

appRoles.displayName: Read all BitLocker keys basic information
appRoles.description: Allows an app to read basic BitLocker key properties for all devices, without a signed-in user. Does not allow read of the recovery key.

appRoles.displayName: Read all group memberships
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read memberships and basic group properties for all groups without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all group memberships
appRoles.description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

appRoles.displayName: Create groups
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create groups without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read threat assessment requests
appRoles.description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all schedule items
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all schedules, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all schedule items
appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage all schedules, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all call records
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read call records for all calls and online meetings without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write your organization's conditional access policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all users' authentication methods
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.                       Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This                      does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods

appRoles.displayName: Read all users' authentication methods
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.                       Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the                      app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

appRoles.displayName: Create tabs in Microsoft Teams.
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

appRoles.displayName: Read tabs in Microsoft Teams.
appRoles.description: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
appRoles.description: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

appRoles.displayName: Read domains
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all domain properties without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies, without a signed-in user.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.

appRoles.displayName: Read all devices
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your organization's devices' configuration information without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage all users' identities
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account, without a signed in user. This controls the identities users can sign-in with.

appRoles.displayName: Read all user shift preferences
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all users' shift schedule preferences without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all user shift preferences
appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage all users' shift schedule preferences without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all OneNote notebooks
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Have full control of all site collections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections without a signed in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all entitlement management resources
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read access packages and related entitlement management resources without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all entitlement management resources
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write access packages and related entitlement management resources without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Create channels
appRoles.description: Create channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Delete channels
appRoles.description: Delete channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels
appRoles.description: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels
appRoles.description: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Get a list of all teams
appRoles.description: Get a list of all teams, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read the names and descriptions  of all channels
appRoles.description: Read all channel names and channel descriptions, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and change all teams' settings
appRoles.description: Read and change all teams' settings, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all teams' settings
appRoles.description: Read all team's settings, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read the members of all teams
appRoles.description: Read the members of all teams, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Add and remove members from all teams
appRoles.description: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a team member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

appRoles.displayName: Read the members of all channels
appRoles.description: Read the members of all channels, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Add and remove members from all channels
appRoles.description: Add and remove members from all channels, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write authentication flow policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write all authentication flow policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all authentication method policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write all authentication method policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write your organization's authorization policy
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's authorization policy without a signed in user. For example, authorization policies can control some of the permissions that the out-of-the-box user role has by default.

appRoles.displayName: Read names and members of all chat threads
appRoles.description: Read names and members of all one-to-one and group chats in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read consent and permission grant policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Manage consent and permission grant policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read printers
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read printers without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and update printers
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read and update printers without a signed-in user. Does not allow creating (registering) or deleting (unregistering) printers.

appRoles.displayName: Perform advanced operations on print jobs
appRoles.description: Allows the application to perform advanced operations like redirecting a print job to another printer without a signed-in user. Also allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs.

appRoles.displayName: Read print jobs
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read the metadata and document content of print jobs without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read basic information for print jobs
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read the metadata of print jobs without a signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write print jobs
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write basic information for print jobs
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs without a signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.

appRoles.displayName: Read, write and update print task definitions
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read and update print task definitions without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Create chat and channel messages with anyone's identity and with any timestamp
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create chat and channel messages, without a signed in user. The app specifies which user appears as the sender, and can backdate the message to appear as if it was sent long ago. The messages can be sent to any chat or channel in the organization.

appRoles.displayName: Read installed Teams apps for all chats
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed in any chat, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Read installed Teams apps for all teams
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Read installed Teams apps for all users
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Manage Teams apps for all chats
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any chat, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Manage Teams apps for all teams
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Manage Teams apps for all users
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

appRoles.displayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for all chats
appRoles.description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for any chat, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for all teams
appRoles.description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself in any team, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Allow the app to manage itself for all users
appRoles.description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself to any user, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Create teams
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create teams without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Add and remove members with non-owner role for all teams
appRoles.description: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.

appRoles.displayName: Read all term store data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all term store data, without a signed-in user. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write all term store data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, edit or write all term store data, without a signed-in user. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.

appRoles.displayName: Read service health
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information, without a signed-in user. Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.

appRoles.displayName: Read service messages
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages, without a signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

appRoles.displayName: Read all users' short notes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all the short notes without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read, create, edit, and delete all users' short notes
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete all the short notes without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read role management data for all RBAC providers
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read role-based access control (RBAC) settings for all RBAC providers without a signed-in user. This includes reading role definitions and role assignments.

appRoles.displayName: Read PSTN and direct routing call log data
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all PSTN and direct routing call log data without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read all chat messages
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all one-to-one and group chats messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all chats
appRoles.description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any chat, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all teams
appRoles.description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs in any team, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Allow the app to manage all tabs for all users
appRoles.description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any user, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read API connectors for authentication flows
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read and write API connectors for authentication flows
appRoles.description: Allows the app to read, create and manage the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read the members of all chats
appRoles.description: Read the members of all chats, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Add and remove members from all chats
appRoles.description: Add and remove members from all chats, without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Create chats
appRoles.description: Allows the app to create chats without a signed-in user.

appRoles.displayName: Read tenant-wide print settings
appRoles.description: Allows the application to read tenant-wide print settings without a signed-in user.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete mail you have permission to access, including your own and shared mail. Does not allow the app to send mail on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write mail you can access
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail a user has permission to access, including their own and shared mail. Does not include permission to send mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared mail

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read mail you can access, including shared mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read mail a user can access, including their own and shared mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user and shared mail

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your organizational account and let the app read your profile. It also allows the app to read basic company information.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Sign in and read user profile

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your profile, and discover your group membership, reports and manager. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your profile. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to user profile

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on your behalf. Includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' basic profiles

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' full profiles

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on your behalf.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups you can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all groups

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.  Additionally allows the app to manage your groups and to update group content for groups you are a member of.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Additionally allows group owners to manage their groups and allows group members to update group content.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all groups

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read directory data

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as other users, groups.  It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups.  It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write directory data

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to information in your work or school directory as you do.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to information in the directory as the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Access directory as the signed in user

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to user mail

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as you.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as users in the organization.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Send mail as a user

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in your calendars.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in user calendars .
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user calendars

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete events in your calendars.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Have full access to your calendars
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events in user calendars.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to user calendars

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read contacts in your contact folders.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read user contacts.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user contacts

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete contacts in your contact folders.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Have full access of your contacts
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user contacts.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to user contacts

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your files.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's files.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user files

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete your files.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Have full access to your files
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete the signed-in user's files.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to user files

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all files you can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read all files that you have access to
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all files the signed-in user can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all files that user can access

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files that you can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Have full access to all files you have access to
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files the signed-in user can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to all files user can access

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the application to read documents and list items in all site collections on your behalf
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to read documents and list  items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your work or school account and allows the app to read your basic profile information.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign in to the app with their work or school accounts and allows the app to see basic user profile information.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Sign users in

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your primary email address
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your users' primary email address
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: View users' email address

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to see your basic profile (name, picture, user name)
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to see your users' basic profile (name, picture, user name)
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: View users' basic profile

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read identity risk event information

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups or administrative units on your behalf, for those hidden groups or adminstrative units that you have access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units on behalf of the signed-in user, for those hidden groups and administrative units that the signed-in user has access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read hidden memberships

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that's most relevant to you. This includes your local contacts, your contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a ranked list of relevant people of the signed-in user. The list includes local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read users' relevant people lists

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the application to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all your site collections
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the application to have full control of all site collections on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Have full control of all your site collections
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to have full control of all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full control of all site collections

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties on behalf of the user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write identity providers

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties on behalf of the user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read identity providers

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to read bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read bookings information

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments and customers, and additionally allows read businesses information, services, and staff on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments and customers, and additionally allows read businesses information, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write booking appointments

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to read and write Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on your behalf. Does not allow create, delete and publish of booking businesses.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow create, delete and publish of booking businesses.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write bookings information

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to read, write and manage bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read, write and manage bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage bookings information

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app full access to your mailboxes on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via Exchange ActiveSync.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Access mailboxes via Exchange ActiveSync

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write financials data on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write financials data on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write financials data

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's user flows, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's user flows, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all identity user flows

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's user flows, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write all identity user flows
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's user flows, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all identity user flows

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on your behalf.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from your personal contacts.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on behalf of the signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read organizational contacts

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for delegated permissions exposed by any API (including Microsoft Graph), on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for delegated permissions exposed by any API (including Microsoft Graph), on behalf of the signed in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage all delegated permission grants

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read online meeting details on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read online meeting details on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user's online meetings

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and create online meetings on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and create your online meetings
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and create online meetings on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and create user's online meetings

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your teamwork activity feed.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's teamwork activity feed.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user's teamwork activity feed

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to manage  your Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure resources
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to manage Azure resources (like subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on behalf of the signed-in users.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure resources

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD groups
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD groups

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access to your Azure resources
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure resources

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD groups
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD groups

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all the indicators for your organization, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all the indicators for your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all threat indicators

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read privileged access requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read privileged access requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read privileged access approval requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read entitlement management requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read entitlement management requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read admin consent requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read customer lockbox requests, business flows and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read customer lockbox approval requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write privileged access requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write privileged access requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access approval requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write entitlement management requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write entitlement management requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write entitlement management approval requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write admin consent requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write admin consent approval requests
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write admin consent requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write admin consent approval requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write customer lockbox requests, business flows and governance policy templates on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write customer lockbox approval requests
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write admin consent requests, business flows, and governance policy templates on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write customer lockbox approval requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read external datasets and content that you have access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allow the app to read external datasets and content, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read items in external datasets

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to delete channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to delete channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to edit channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Edit user's channel messages

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to send channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to send channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for you. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for the signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on your behalf. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage user's Teams apps

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your personal places.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user’s personal places.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user places

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, and update personal places on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, and update the signed-in user’s personal places.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user places

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write organization places

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read other users’ personal places that the signed-in user has delegate access to. Also allows read of the signed-in user’s personal places.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user places for delegates

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to request access to and management of access packages and related entitlement management resources that you have access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write entitlement management resources
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to request access to and management of access packages and related entitlement management resources on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write entitlement management resources

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to send, read, update and delete user’s notifications.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Deliver and manage user's notifications
