oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read applications

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals on your behalf. Does not allow management of consent grants.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow management of consent grants.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all applications

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read BitLocker keys for your owned devices. Allows read of the recovery key.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read BitLocker keys on behalf of the signed-in user, for their owned devices. Allows read of the recovery key.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read BitLocker keys

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read basic BitLocker key properties for your owned devices. Does not allow read of the recovery key itself.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read your BitLocker keys basic information
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read basic BitLocker key properties on behalf of the signed-in user, for their owned devices. Does not allow read of the recovery key itself.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read BitLocker keys basic information

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, read basic group properties and read membership of all your groups.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, read basic group properties and read membership of all groups the signed-in user has access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read group memberships

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of your groups. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups the signed-in user has access to. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write group memberships

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests on your behalf. Also allows the app to create new requests to assess threats received by your organization on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write threat assessment requests
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new requests to assess threats received by your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write threat assessment requests

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read schedule, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read schedule, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user schedule items

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage schedule, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write your schedule items
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage schedule, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user schedule items

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write authentication methods of all users you have access to in your organization.                       Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow                      the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write all users' authentication methods
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to.                       Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This                      does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all users' authentication methods.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings.This does not allow the app to see secret information like your passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use your authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write your authentication methods
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings.                       This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or                      to sign-in or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user authentication methods

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users you have access to in your organization. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' authentication methods

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like your passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use your authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or to sign-in  or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user authentication methods.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on your behalf. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on behalf of the signed-in user and also for teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for you, and in teams you are a member of. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for the signed-in user, and in all teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all installed Teams apps

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Create tabs in Microsoft Teams.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read tabs in Microsoft Teams.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via IMAP protocol.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to mailboxes via IMAP.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via POP protocol.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to mailboxes via POP.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to send emails on your behalf from your mailbox.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Access to sending emails from your mailbox.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to be able to send emails from the user’s mailbox using the SMTP AUTH client submission protocol.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Send emails from mailboxes using SMTP AUTH.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all domain properties on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all domain properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read domains.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write all domain properties on your behalf. Also allows the app to add, verify and remove domains.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write all domain properties on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to add, verify and remove domains.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write domains

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on your behalf. oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on behalf of the signed-in user.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy,  tokenIssuancePolicy and tokenLifetimePolicy.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's devices' configuration information on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all devices

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in teams you can access. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in teams the signed-in user can access. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage installed Teams apps in teams

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself in chats you can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself in chats
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself in chats the signed-in user can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself in chats

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself to teams you can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Allow the app to manage itself in teams
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself to teams the signed-in user can access.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Allow the app to manage itself in teams

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for you.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for you
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for a user

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps installed for you. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps installed for the signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage user's installed Teams apps

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create teams on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create teams on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Create teams

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, on your behalf. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Add and remove members with non-owner role for all teams
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Add and remove members with non-owner role for all teams

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the term store data that you have access to. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the term store data that the signed-in user has access to. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read term store data

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read or modify data that you have access to. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write term store data
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read or modify data that the signed-in user has access to. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write term store data

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on your behalf. Messages may include information about new or changed features.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on behalf of the signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read service announcement messages

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information on your behalf.Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information on behalf of the signed-in user. Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read service health

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your short notes.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all the short notes a sign-in user has access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read short notes of the signed-in user

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete your short notes.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete your short notes
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete short notes of a signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete short notes of the signed-in user

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for all RBAC providers, on your behalf.  This includes reading role definitions and role assignments.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read role management data for all RBAC providers
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for all RBAC providers, on behalf of the signed-in user.  This includes reading role definitions and role assignments.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read role management data for all RBAC providers

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to send one-to-one and group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to send one-to-one and group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Send user chat messages

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read the members and descriptions of one-to-one and group chat threads, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read names and members of user chat threads

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the properties of Cloud PCs, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the properties of Cloud PCs on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write Cloud PCs

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the properties of Cloud PCs, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the properties of Cloud PCs on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read Cloud PCs

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in chats you can access. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in chats the signed-in user can access. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Create, read, update, and delete user’s tasks and task lists

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your tasks and task lists, including any shared with you. Doesn't include permission to create, delete, or update anything.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read your tasks and task lists
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user’s tasks and task lists, including any shared with the user. Doesn't include permission to create, delete, or update anything.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user's tasks and task lists

oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows an app to read one-to-one or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read one-to-one and group chat messages, on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user chat messages

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs in chats the signed-in user can access.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs to teams the signed-in user can access.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the API connectors used in user authentication flows, on behalf of the signed-in user.
